item.description: We had a great response..... let's now do it.........setback after dinner.....I will gladly teach the fundamentals .....if anyone wants to help also...please feel welcome !!!! We will have a nice meal at Lou's...(have been there a few times )....check out the menu...http://www.luckylousbarandgrill.com/menus/  very good food whatever you choose....I have been playing setback for quite some time now and am currently in a setback league....once you get the hang of it....you are hooked !!!! we will play partners 2 versus 2 later in the evening...any questions or suggestions please feel free to write....my e-mail is chuckles39@comcast.net....let's have fun !!!!! All you have to do is bring yourself.....I will supply cards and score sheets......we also will have a private dining room .....
item.how_to_find_us: a warm welcome by chuck 860-729-4504 my email chuckles39@comcast.net

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: SETBACK 101. FUN AND GAMES NOV 19 7pm
